Name: Niops Association
Description: The ruling caste of the Association consists of the scientists, who use their closely guarded technological secrets to justify their position by keeping a higher standard of living then the rest of the Periphery. While an association, the other castes are kept under strict control, with constant surveillance and straight compliance required at all times.
ReputationStatements: The high council has an important mission for you mercenary.

MissionSuccessStatements: Well done, Commander. We obviously placed our faith in the right mercenary company. We'll let you know if we have any other work for you.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: You win some, you lose some. Sometimes it's in between. I'm disappointed you couldn't complete the contract, but at least you gave it your best shot.
BadFaithFailureStatements: For somebody who came so highly recommended, you let us down pretty hard. Thanks for nothing, I guess.
